entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. The text mentions Harry's hesitation and his fear of being caught cheating.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A teacher who is also a participant in the Triwizard Tournament. He is described as sitting down and stretching out his wooden leg with a groan.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The text mentions that Hagrid had broken the rules by cheating in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A participant in the Triwizard Tournament who is mentioned as someone Harry hasn't told about his cheating.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: An annual magical competition between three schools. The text mentions that cheating has always been a part of this event.

relationships.description: Moody asks Harry if he's found out about the dragons, bringing him back to reality.
Harry hasn't told Cedric that Hagrid had broken the rules by cheating in the Triwizard Tournament.
Moody is a participant in the Triwizard Tournament.
